titles.title: Build up the house of the Lord together

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Build up the house of the Lord together.
Build up the house of the Lord with all your heart.
Labor not for those things that fade away;
Labor one and all for the house.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The watchmen shall lift up the voice unto the Lord and with one heart together they shall sing in Zion
They shall see eye to eye,
eye to eye
They shall see eye to eye

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Edificad la casa del Señor juntos,
Edificadla de todo corazón.
No trabajéis por lo que ha de perecer,
Juntos todos la casa edificad.
